thread.title: Area bowling for Oct. 24

author: buffalonews
title: Area bowling for Oct. 24
text:
Area bowling
11TH FRAME: Capital Management Services — Dana Holmes 254-284-756, Chris Vogt 265-268-743, Tom Daucher 255-682, Greg Merkle 675, Brent Hardy 252.
ABBOTT: Thursday Seniors — Bill Novara 255. John Hinman Memorial — Brian Ash 259-268-279-806, Terry Schiltz 259-724, Eric Gee 269-718, Dan Blizniak 257-685, Jeff Spanitz 254. Dick Robinson Insurance — Ken Kuebler 279-782, Jim Winsor 256-269-754, Tom Bigaj 258-268-742, Ed Just 254-729, Joe Doxbeck 707.
AIRPORT: Cold Spring Classic — Tammy Turner 629, Connie McMillan 621, Ricara Beckham 616, Debra Ervin 613, Antonio Mercado 300, Chill Holliday 289, Shawn Albright 769, Terrance Leslie, Jr. 729. Cheektowaga Firemen — Rick Starzynski Jr. 258-719, Doug Rogacki 265.

BRAD ANGELO: Practice Makes Perfect — Nick Likus 256, Brad Kunkle 255. Midnight Bombers — Stan Knight 266-718, Kevin Ryan 682, John Walker 678. Nin Angelo Memorial/So-Cal Grill — Ron Sementelli 716, Ron Kipp 257-708, Brandon Kipp 275-706, Tim Goehle 256.

Kerm Helmer Memorial — Kevin Donaghue 278-258-773, Holly Filarecki 279-278-728, Chris McMillan 258-690, Mark Kline 300-682, Ray Richards 676, Connie McMillan 228-652, Tamara Turner 242-629, Danielle Dolegala 226-610.
CHICKS: Harrity Optical — Frank Galfo III 257-736, Kenny Heppel 258.
EDEN: Jerry Haag Memorial— Matt Williams 300-259-773.
KENMORE: Kenmore Renting — Tony Dolan 279-749, Joe Mercurio Jr. 255-733, Vinny Fermo 700, Matt Burt 677, Henry Allenbach 259, Katlyn Schaus 228. Tom Foley All-Stars — Bob Ehrmann 259-259-747, Tim Finken 266-724, Krista Voelker-Burt — 233-244-689, Jeff Booker 254-676, Kyle Garshnick 258. BS Classic — Sean Bentley 258-257-736, Phil Tabbi 267-708, Joe Rubrecht 677, Dave Aichinger 300-675, Art Sinicki 255. UAW 774 Doubles — Rich Sterner Jr. 276-755, Dom Botti 265-724, Wes O’Kelly 706, Jr Baker 257-704, David McClamb 269-693. CPC — John Sobinski 683, Bill Wenske 676. Friday Senior Men — John Greico 255-702, Lucky Withey 682.
MANOR: Tonawanda Firemen — Robert Hinman 266-713.
STRIKERS: Dick Baldwin Memorial — Jason Barren 279-279-773, Andy Woof 253, Joe DePalma 251.
TONAWANDA: Engineers — Julia Hay 601. Brady Electric — Mike Weber 256-736, Jim Daughtery 290-700, Scoot Barker 264-685, Chris Schultz 258, Brian Clinton 257.
TRANSIT: Buffalo City Dental — Ray Niceforo 269-684. Creative — Mike Brenda 268-764, Brandon Korczykowski 265-739, Dan Dayfert 690, Ryan McIntyre 681. Major B — Jeff Walsh 300-758, Michael Kwiatkowski 279-752, Steve John 276-749, Greg Duckworth 269-689, Bill Cratsenberg 280-678.
WIMBLEDON: South Buffalo Church — Dave Hearn 266-687, Mike Mancuso 258-740, Steve Mancuso 679, Steve Mankowski 286-766. Memorial — Brian Lipczynski 259-696, Dale Weidright 715, Tim Urban 684, Jim Johnt 680, Bob Lombard 266-675. Strike Force — Spencer Lajoy 279-737, Ron Wilkowski Jr. 254-732, Kevin Volker 278-726, Mike Drehs 258-254-706, Carl Rosati 257-695.
300 Games
Dave Aichinger, in a 675 series in BS Classic at Kenmore.
Brian Beach, in BW’S/Cagney’s C2 at Abbott.
Nick Byers, in a 781 series in Tuesday Night Playboys at Tonawanda.
Fred Gravanda, in a 738 series in Storm Bowlers Choice Senior Shootout at Transit.
Mike Johnson, in a 838 series in A Best Men at Island.
Mark Kline, his first, in a 682 series in Kerm Helmer Memorial at Broadway.
Anthony Mercado, in Cold Spring Classic at Airport.
Mat Mikula, in a 740 series in Christian Church at Lancaster.
Ryan Rose, in a 691 series in Birzon Jewelers at Tonawanda.
Joe Vilardo, in an 827 series in Erik Fanara Memorial at Kenmore.
Jeff Walsh, in a 758 series in Major B at Transit.
Bill Widmer, his first, in Wednesday Night Businessmen at Strikers.
Matt Williams, his fourth, in a 773 series in Jerry Haag Memorial at Eden.
Mike Zarcone, in a 858 series in Alzena Wright Classic Doubles at Classic.
